name: Zombica the land of the Zombies
name_original: Zombica the land of the Zombies
description:
Welcome to the tale of Zombica! Inspired by Lyrica, Zombica takes a thrilling twist on it and adds more ways to finish and win the game! Good luck and one last thing, don't jump off the cliff.

There are also videos on how to get each ending.

Release 1.00
